text: Marvin Henry "Mickey" Edwards (born July 12, 1937) is an American politician. He was a Republican member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Oklahoma's 5th congressional district from 1977 to 1993. Edwards was born in Cleveland, Ohio. He studied at the University of Oklahoma and at Oklahoma City University. In January 2021, Edwards said he was no longer a member of the Republican Party because he felt that it was a "cult serving Donald Trump". ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Oklahoma Category:Politicians from Cleveland Category:Politicians from Oklahoma City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Independent politicians in the United States
title: Mickey Edwards
